tool.name: PartitionNNInputFiles

param.name: inputfiles
param.dialogReference:
• Path of class.dta file to partition.

  • Input file must have more that 200,000 records.

  • Output partitions are named class1.dta,...,classN.dta.

  • For example, class0.dta produces class01.dta,...,class0N.dta.

tool.summary: This tool is used to partition a Class file with more than 200,000 records into subsets of 200,000 or fewer records. Then GeoXplore can classify each of these partitioned files to create the output RBN, FUZ, or PNN files. These partitioned outputs can then be recombine using the Combine NNOuput Files. This tool is needed because of the 200,000 record limit of GeoXplore.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool is used to partition a Class file with more than 200,000 records into subsets of 200,000 or fewer records. Then GeoXplore can classify each of these partitioned files to create the output RBN, FUZ, or PNN files. These partitioned outputs can then be recombine using the Combine NNOuput Files. This tool is needed because of the 200,000 record limit of GeoXplore.
